1. Self-learning AI releases NFL against the spread, over-under, money-line picks for each 2024 Week 3 game  CBS Sports

item.title: Copilot Pages is Microsoft’s new collaborative AI playground for businesses - The Verge
item.description:
1. Copilot Pages is Microsoft’s new collaborative AI playground for businesses  The Verge
  2. Microsoft 365 Copilot Wave 2: Pages, Python in Excel, and agents  Microsoft
  3. Satya Nadella says this AI tool is his 'daily habit.' And of course it's from Microsoft  Quartz
  4. Microsoft bringing more AI technology to its productivity software as it works to monetize investments  Yahoo Finance
  5. Microsoft says ChatGPT isn't better than Copilot; you're just not using it as intended, but Copilot Academy is here to help  Windows Central
